ports.name: inPort1
ports.expression: let portOwner = graph.ports.find(port => port.tag.primitiveID === primitiveID).owner; let inEdges = graph.inEdgesAt(portOwner).filter(edge => edge.targetPort.tag.primitiveID === primitiveID).toArray() if (inEdges.length < 1) '' else {eval(inEdges[0].sourcePort.tag.primitiveID).status}
